responseText: The issue is coverage, really. There are so many newcomers that need orientation and help, that we can't keep up with the smaller stuff we like to do, like return lost goods to their owners. People are constantly losing things on their way to their new homes, we find lost things all along the roadways. If you misplaced something special to you, wouldn't you want some kind soul to return it? We've got some logistics clerks at the established settlements. I'm sure they'd compensate you if you brought in some lost parcels.
name: SQ_Lionhold_Clotharmor_Timony_9_Response
